name: Mouse forelimb directed cued reaching premotor and primary motor cortex
citation: Miri, Andrew (2025) Mouse forelimb directed cued reaching premotor and primary motor cortex (Version draft) [Data set]. DANDI Archive. https://dandiarchive.org/dandiset/001466/draft
description: Neural and behavioral data for Saiki-Ishikawa et al 2025, 'Hierarchy between forelimb premotor and primary motor cortices and its manifestation in their firing patterns'. Consists of dual-probe neuropixel recordings of RFA and CFA as well as optogenetic experiments inactivating RFA and recording CFA and vice-versa.
